text: Frontline is the fourth studio album by the Australian folk-rock group Redgum.Redgum discography Album information It was the last album that John Schumann performed on.That Striped Sunlight Sound blog Frontline review ==Track listing== ;Side A #"I've Been to Bali Too" (J. Schumann) #"ASIO" (M. Atkinson) #"Friday Night" (M. Atkinson) #"Spirit of the Land" (H. McDonald) #"Gladstone Pier" (M. Atkinson) ;Side B #"Spark of the Heart" (M. Atkinson) #"Still Life" (H. McDonald/V. Truman) #"Working Girls" (J. Schumann) #"Beyond Reason" (J. Schumann) #"Hira" (J. Schumann/S. Cooney) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (1984) !Position |- |Australia (Kent Music Report) |align="center"|18 |} ==References== Category:1984 albums Category:Redgum albums
title: Frontline (album)
